docs.lead_paragraph: We have discussed postpartum depression here often on Motherlode, but the subject of depression during pregnancy comes up less frequently. I received an e-mail from a reader who is grappling with the problem - her daughter is pregnant and despondent. They are speaking with medical experts but the grandma-to-be is hoping that readers might have some advice. Have you struggled with depression during pregnancy? Has someone you loved? What might this reader do to help her daughter?
docs.abstract: A grandma-to-be is hoping that readers might have some advice for her daughter.
docs.snippet: A grandma-to-be is hoping that readers might have some advice for her daughter.

docs.lead_paragraph: This week, Alison Lowenstein, the author of "City Kid New York: The Ultimate Guide for NYC Parents With Kids Ages 4-12" (Rizzoli/Universe 2010), responded to readers' questions about child-friendly activities in the city, and other related questions.
docs.abstract: Taking Questions: Alison Lowenstein, the author of "City Kid New York: The Ultimate Guide for NYC Parents With Kids Ages 4-12," responds to readers' questions.

docs.lead_paragraph: After decades of inattention, Lewis Spratlan’s Pulitzer Prize-winning opera “Life Is a Dream” is to receive a full production by the Santa Fe Opera.

headline.seo: Santa Fe Opera to Stage Lewis Spratlan’s  ‘Life Is a Dream’

docs.snippet: After decades of inattention, Lewis Spratlan’s Pulitzer Prize-winning opera “Life Is a Dream” is to receive a full production by the Santa Fe Opera.

docs.lead_paragraph: Currently, pregnancy is pretty much considered an uninsurable pre-existing condition. How will the health bill affect women's ability to get reasonable maternity health care? Family Starter, San Francisco

headline.main: Will the Law Improve Access to Maternity Care?

docs.abstract: Beginning in 2014, the legislation will prevent insurers from excluding pregnant women from new plans, and health exchanges must offer benefits packages that include maternity care.
docs.snippet: Beginning in 2014, the legislation will prevent insurers from excluding pregnant women from new plans, and health exchanges must offer benefits packages that include maternity care.

docs.lead_paragraph: It’s the internal contradictions and mash-up sensibility that make Fox’s musical series fun. The production numbers are the least of it.

headline.seo: In Fox’s ‘Glee,’ It’s the Attitude That’s the Showstopper

docs.lead_paragraph: Mothers-to-be will lose a midwife-friendly alternative after a decision by the board of St. Vincent’s Medical Centers to close its flagship hospital in Greenwich Village.
